text: Joseph Henabery (January 15, 1888 â€“ February 18, 1976) was an American actor, screenwriter, and director. He was born in Omaha, Nebraska. Henabery was best known for his role of Abraham Lincoln in D.W. Griffith's controversial 1915 silent movie The Birth of a Nation. Henabery died on February 18, 1976, aged 88, in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1888 births Category:1976 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Writers from Omaha, Nebraska Category:American movie directors
title: Joseph Henabery
